name: Denizens of Hell
startIntroPart1: We will Cleanse The Mortal Realm
startIntroPart2: The Demons march forth, so that I may test out the modding api
declaringWar: Your sins have finally caught up to you!
attacked: We applaud your pitiful attempts at war, we will strike back with wrath!
defeated: No matter how you run, one day you all will fall back to us...
introduction: Run, Hide, It doesn't matter. We will burn this world, and you with it. Or, you can join the horde, and burn them with us...
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: You have bought time from the Devil...Your souls are already ours...
